question: 既に
sourceMnemonic: One of the meanings is the same as the kanji, <vocabulary>previously</vocabulary>, but it can also mean <vocabulary>already</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is different from what you learned with the kanji. But as I told you <vocabulary>already</vocabulary>, I'll be there on <reading>Su-day</reading> (<ja>すで</ja>). It's like Sunday, but not quite the same. Imagine your confusion when someone says this over and over, but you don't know what Suday is.
